item.title: F* Challenge or The Tale of Tails
item.description: F* is a verification-oriented programming language developed at Microsoft Research. If you already know F#, or OCaml, or Haskell, or another language from ML family, you’ll find it familiar. Resources: F* project home Rise4Fun – try it online/go through the guide F* download To start experimenting with the language on your machine you need .NET 4.0. With Windows that’s it – just start enjoying verifications.
